ActorRole.Text: Durable Power of Attorney for Healthcare

Instruction.Text: Hold dose if patient becomes markedly light headed.

Description.Text:
FINAL REPORT ***

Culture Results Enterobacter aerogenes - GREATER THAN 100 X 10^6 COLONY FORMING UNITS (CFU)/L *** Sensitivity Results *** Organism :Entero aerogenes ANTIMICROBIAL THERAPEUTIC DOSE MIC BLOOD URINE ----------------------------------------------------------------------

AMPICILLIN NC >16 R R GENTAMICIN NC <=4 S S TOBRAMYCIN NC <=4 S S SEPTRA NC <=.5/9.5 S S NITROFURANTOIN NC <=32 S

Patients >10 years of age with type 1 diabetes should have an initial dilated and comprehensive eye examination by an ophthalmologist or optometrist within 3–5 years after the onset of diabetes. In general, screening for diabetic eye disease is not necessary before 10 years of age.
